Date Exercisable | Expiration Date | Title | Amount or Number of Shares
Employee Stock Options | (2) | 03/06/2033 | Common Stock | 7,917 | $ 253.98 | D |
Employee Stock Options | (3) | 03/04/2034 | Common Stock | 2,997 | $ 338.65 | D |
Employee Stock Options | (4) | 03/03/2035 | Common Stock | 2,509 | $ 332.04 | D |

Explanation of Responses:
1. The information in this report is based on a 401(k) plan statement dated as of December 31, 2025.
2. The stock options were granted pursuant to the Caterpillar Inc. 2014 Long-Term Incentive Plan on 03/06/2023 and vest equally in 1/3 increments on the first, second and third anniversaries of the grant date.
3. The stock options were granted pursuant to the Caterpillar Inc. 2023 Long-Term Incentive Plan on 03/04/2024 and vest equally in 1/3 increments on the first, second and third anniversaries of the grant date.
4. The stock options were granted pursuant to the Caterpillar Inc. 2023 Long-Term Incentive Plan on 03/03/2025 and vest equally in 1/3 increments on the first, second and third anniversaries of the grant date.
Remarks:
Exhibit 24 - Power of Attorney

 | /s/ Nicole M. Puza for Rodney M. Shurman | 02/06/2026
 | ** Signature of Reporting Person | Date
Reminder: Report on a separate line for each class of securities beneficially owned directly or indirectly.
* If the form is filed by more than one reporting person, see Instruction
                  5

                  (b)(v).
** Intentional misstatements or omissions of facts constitute Federal Criminal Violations See 18 U.S.C. 1001 and 15 U.S.C. 78ff(a).
Note: File three copies of this Form, one of which must be manually signed. If space is insufficient, see Instruction 6 for procedure.
Persons who respond to the collection of information contained in this form are not required to respond unless the form displays a currently valid OMB Number.
structure.summary: The partial document provides details about Employee Stock Options under Caterpillar Inc.'s Long-Term Incentive Plans, specifically for the years 2014, 2023, and 2025. Each option has a different grant date, vesting schedule, and expiration date. The document also includes information about the number of shares, conversion or exercise price, ownership form (direct), and nature of indirect beneficial ownership (not specified in the provided text). Additionally, there is a Power of Attorney signed by Nicole M. Puza for Rodney M. Shurman dated 02/06/2026. The document reminds the reader to report each class of securities beneficially owned directly or indirectly and warns about intentional misstatements or omissions of facts being federal criminal violations.
